Reviews.Title: So far is doing well for my use
Reviews.Author: David S
Reviews.Content: I bought this to monitor different inputs for a video mixer I bought for my church. So far it is doing a very good job. I would buy this again if needed.

ProductInfo.Features:
8 Channel H.264 Pentaplex Network DVR
240FPS Realtime Display Realtime Recording
1280*1024 VGA Output
8 CH Playback .
Mobile Phone Surveillance, Compact Form Factor
ProductInfo.Name: LTD7908 8 Ch H.264 Pentaplex Network DVR D1 Recording, 8CH Playback,Mac compatible ,Mobile Surveillance *NO HDD* sold by Acelevel
